title: Crave
description: Lilly Jacobs certainly hadn’t had an easy lot in life. Leaving behind everything she’d ever known was the hardest thing Lilly had ever had to endure. Until she’d met Jake Cavanaugh. He was an, arrogant, chauvinistic jerk that barged into her life one day, and like a bad rash, just wouldn’t go away.  Jake Cavanaugh was living the dream. As CEO of Cavanaugh Industries, and a well-known eligible bachelor, he was living the high life…and enjoying every minute of it. When Jake ended up having a less than stellar encounter with Lillian Jacobs, she’d rubbed him the wrong way from the get go.  As Jake and Lilly continue to be thrown into each other’s lives, can they learn to put their differences aside? Or would a shocking revelation be the tipping point that brings them together? Perhaps there’s more than meets the eye when it comes to Jake and Lilly. Then again, being a self-proclaimed playboy, Lilly may just be Jake’s latest craving…
author: Kiara Delaney
